t=int(raw_input())
while(t):
	t-=1
	s=list(str(raw_input()))
	n=int(raw_input())
	l=len(s)
	if l%2!=0 and n%2!=0:
		print "".join(s[n-1:]+s[:n-1][::-1])
	elif l%2==0 and n%2!=0:
		print "".join(s[n-1:]+s[:n-1])
	elif l%2!=0 and n%2==0:
		print "".join(s[n-1:]+s[:n-1])
	else:
		print "".join(s[n-1:]+s[:n-1][::-1])
